title: The vision paper
content:
Hi everybody,

What is the font use for "the vision paper"  
link : [http://brunswicker.dk/wp/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/TVP\_AW13\_Overview1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022135207/http:/brunswicker.dk/wp/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/TVP_AW13_Overview1.jpg "http://brunswicker.dk/wp/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/TVP\_AW13\_Overview1.jpg")

thanks !
author: theo2505

comments.content: Most probably a [custom job by Brunswicker](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022135207/http:/brunswicker.dk/work/vision/the-vision-paper-ss13) and based on [P22 Underground](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022135207/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/underground-pro), some sort of prismatic version of it.
